items.text: ooh and that one is a play and a miss from a good flighted one on a length outside off
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: this will not make Nurse happy. Shakib cuts this to point and there's another misfield and another single conceded
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full toss, swatted to long on
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: gives himself room to tray and flay it through point but misses it altogether
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: cuts this to point, and this time there is no misfield
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: fuller on the pads, worked to square leg
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: another mis-field. full ball, he came forward to work it to square leg in the circle, and Dowrich made a hash of it running across, allows a second
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: pushed to long-off
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length, darted into him and spinning away, he defends from the crease
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: straighter one, flicked to short fine, and would you believe, there is yet another mis-field!. What on earth's happening to West Indies. Another single conceded where there should have been none
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off and he comes on the front foot to drive pleasingly through extra cover with the full face of the bat
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Shuvo: "Bd would have loved to play against players like Gayle, Russell,Hetmyer for their WC prep, winning int'l matches will give them confidence anyway"
items.text: fullish, driven to long off
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: angled into him and he uses the pace to steer it wide of point for a single
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length, pushed firmly to deep cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up, he wanted to drive that powerfully, but can't get past short cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full toss, clipped to long on
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: made as if to give himself room but didn't  - but the bowler was fooled and bowled it wide down leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: tossed up again but on the pads, and he's easily tucked to square leg for a couple
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.preText: Anon06: "That's a long time to hold a grudge. Especially since only 2 players in this team would've possibly been in that 2011 game: Roach and Bravo."
items.text: given some air, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, square driven to deep point
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, waits for it and dabs it to short third man
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: Tamim's moving around a lot in his crease, though I don't understand way. Makes as if to give himself room again but brings his leg back in position, ends up tucking it to square leg
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run
Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up a bit and dipping on him, doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, ends up half steering it towards the slips area
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, has a thrash at it, but doesn't time it, rolls to point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
